test.name: should return an Error instance when message is empty
test.method: Unit test._computeErrorWhenValidate.should return an Error instance when message is empty

test.name: should return an Error with message when splitting is impossible
test.method: Unit test._computeErrorWhenValidate.should return an Error with message when splitting is impossible

test.name: should return null when message is valid
test.method: Unit test._computeErrorWhenValidate.should return null when message is valid

test.name: if no error, should dispatch event send-message when executed
test.method: Unit test._sendMessage.if no error, should dispatch event send-message when executed

test.name: if error,should not dispatch event send-message
test.method: Unit test._sendMessage.if error,should not dispatch event send-message

test.name: should return true when splitMessage success
test.method: Unit test._canSplitMessage.should return true when splitMessage success

test.name: should return false when splitMessage failed
test.method: Unit test._canSplitMessage.should return false when splitMessage failed

test.name: should trigger validate after 250ms
test.method: Unit test._messageChanged.should trigger validate after 250ms

test.name: should add event listener to form
test.method: Unit test.connectedCallback.should add event listener to form

test.name: A valid message with length 3
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.A valid message with length 3

test.name: A valid message with length 50
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.A valid message with length 50

test.name: A valid message with length 91
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.A valid message with length 91

test.name: A valid message with length 1103
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.A valid message with length 1103

test.name: A valid message with length 4415
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.A valid message with length 4415

test.name: An invalid message with length 0
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.An invalid message with length 0

test.name: An invalid message with length 92
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.An invalid message with length 92

test.name: An invalid message with length 91
test.method: TweetSplitHelper.splitMessage.An invalid message with length 91

test.name: should set the tweets to empty when execute
test.method: Unit test._initTweets.should set the tweets to empty when execute

test.name: should unshift the message to tweets
test.method: Unit test._handleSendMessage.should unshift the message to tweets

test.name: should add event listener send-message to method _handleSendMessage
test.method: Unit test.connectedCallback.should add event listener send-message to method _handleSendMessage
